action.action-desc: Mr. Reed (for himself, Mr. Franken, Ms. Stabenow, Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Sanders, and Mr. Brown) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend the reduced interest rate for Federal Direct Stafford Loans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Student Loan Affordability Act of 2013.
